EmailTemplate.subject: Used Truck Savings with International Used Truck Centers
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I wanted to make sure you knew about our used trucks savings with International Used Truck Centers. As an FTS Plus+ member, you can receive a $500 rebate on any used make or model purchased at an approved International Used Truck Center. No matter what price you pay, the rebate stays the same.
Simply visit an approved International Used Truck Center, negotiate your best price on any used truck, and fax a copy of your invoice to us at 877.902.1498. We will process your invoice(s), and the rebate will appear as a credit on your FTS card.
For full details and to find an authorized dealer, please visit ftsplus.com/iutc.
Your Member ID: {!Account.Member_ID__c} Your Password: {!Account.Web_Password__c}
Thank you, Nancy Gustafson FTS Plus+ Representative Phone: 800.749.1724 info@ftsplus.com
